mapper.select: SELECT A.EVENT_NO, A.EVENT_THUMNAIL_URL, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.STATE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY STATE DESC, EVENT_NO DESC) AS RN, EVENT_NO,EVENT_THUMNAIL_URL,TITLE,STATE,CONTENTS FROM EVENT_T) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
SELECT EVENT_NO, TITLE, CONTENTS, HIT, STATE, EVENT_THUMNAIL_URL, DISCOUNT_PERCENT, DISCOUNT_PRICE, START_AT,END_AT FROM EVENT_T ORDER BY EVENT_NO DESC

SELECT E.EVENT_NO,E.EVENT_THUMNAIL_URL,E.TITLE,E.CONTENTS,E.STATE,E.HIT,E.START_AT,E.END_AT, E.DISCOUNT_PERCENT, E.DISCOUNT_PRICE, I.PATH FROM EVENT_T E LEFT OUTER JOIN EVENT_IMAGE_T I ON E.EVENT_NO = I.EVENT_NO WHERE E.EVENT_NO = #{eventNo}

SELECT E.EVENT_NO, E.EVENT_THUMNAIL_URL, E.STATE, I.FILESYSTEM_NAME,E.END_AT, I.PATH FROM EVENT_T E LEFT OUTER JOIN EVENT_IMAGE_T I ON E.EVENT_NO = I.EVENT_NO WHERE E.STATE = 0 AND I.PATH LIKE '/event/' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1,'YYYY/MM/DD') ||'%' AND E.END_AT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1, 'YYYY/MM/DD')
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT_T SET STATE = 0 WHERE END_AT = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE -1,'YYYY/MM/DD')
